<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extracts are just reads of a subregister, so are free. Inserts are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// considered free because we don&#39;t want to have any cost for scalarizing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations, and we don&#39;t have to copy into a different register class.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Dynamic indexing isn&#39;t free and is best avoided.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index == ~0u ? 2 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
